name: PopUp Blockers Unlimited - New Thumb Browser Craze
name_original: PopUp Blockers Unlimited - New Thumb Browser Craze
description:
Think you are fast enough in using technology? The meter continues to rise... How long can you stop the onslaught... Stop the popups here and now!

Pop Up Blockers is the latest craze to hit the block!

* No IAPs, No additional requirements, No In Game Transactions
* Game runs on all iPhones, iPod Touches and iPads running 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
* Small file size
* Early access sale price


No crippled gameplay, No data requirements. No micro transactions. No IAP. Just game.
